column1: Celebration of life services will be held 11:30 a.m. Tuesday
column3: 2015 at the United Methodist Church with Pastor Jim Stiles officiating. Visitation will begin 12:00 p.m. Monday at the Jones & Eden Funeral Home where the family will receive friends from 4:00 until 7:00 Monday evening. Interment will be held at Wellman Cemetery at a later date.
